  • Method Details

    • AddTeacher

      boolean AddTeacher(String email, String firstName, String lastName, String password)
      Adds a new teacher to the database.
      Parameters:
      email - Teacher's email.
      firstName - Teacher's first name.
      lastName - Teacher's last name.
      password - Teacher's plain text password (to be hashed by implementation).
      Returns:
      true if the teacher was added successfully, false otherwise.

    • checkEmail

      boolean checkEmail(String email)
      Checks if an email has been registered to the database
      Specified by:
      checkEmail in interface UserDAO
      Parameters:
      email - The email that is being checked
      Returns:
      true if email was found, false if not

    • ChangePassword

      boolean ChangePassword(String email, String newPassword)
      Changes the password for an existing teacher account.
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the teacher.
      newPassword - The new plain text password (to be hashed by implementation).
      Returns:
      true if the password was changed successfully, false otherwise.

    • checkPassword

      boolean checkPassword(String email, String password)
      Checks an input password against the stored password of an account
      Specified by:
      checkPassword in interface UserDAO
      Parameters:
      email - email of the account being checked
      password - the input password
      Returns:
      true if passwords match, false if not

    • createClassroom

      void createClassroom(String ClassID, String Teacher)
      This creates a new classroom instance in the database.
      Parameters:
      ClassID - is the primary key in the database.
      Teacher - is the teacher associated with the class.

    • getTeacherID

      int getTeacherID(String teacherEmail)
      Retrieves the teacher's unique identifier (TeacherID) based on their email address.
      Parameters:
      teacherEmail - the email address of the teacher whose ID is to be retrieved
      Returns:
      the TeacherID associated with the provided email address, or -1 if no match is found or an error occurs

    • getClassroomList

      List<Integer> getClassroomList(String teacherEmail)
      Retrieves a list of classroom IDs associated with the given teacher's email.
      Parameters:
      teacherEmail - the email address of the teacher whose classrooms are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a list of integers representing the classroom IDs associated with the teacher
